𓇍

𐀁-𐀒-𐀕-𐀜 e-ko-me-no …kommen comming (zu- …)

𒀠𒆷𒄰𒈠 ʷal-la-kam-ma walk-come(me) I will come

𒀉𒋫𒀠 𒄰 ʷit-ta-al-kam come(with) mitkomm-

𔑣 ar- arrive 𓇍 ar < jir < gir 𓂻 𓂽 𔑣 𔑦 𔗸 𔗷𔖱 va arriba 𓉔 𓄿 𓉔 𓃀 𓍁 𓀜 < 𓐍 𓊪 𓂋 𓆣

𓇍 ج ي ء ʒ-y-ʾ jir:come

𓇍 come 𓂻 and 𓂽 go

𒂵𒈾;𒃷 ga-na;gana #gana go-now! come on!

𓂻 bein.ir bènniri@Sardinian venir 𓃀 vegner @Weg vs weg
𓂻 ari.ba 𐤁𐤀 bʾ בָּא ba 𓂽 arriba arrive 𓇍 #jwj va vs va
𓂽 جه geh գալ gal gəlmək "come" @ goal 𐰚𐰠 kel کلادو kelādū келу kelu келир kelir килерге kilerge vs go
𓂽 barr "come"

𓂻 رَجَعَ rajaʿa rejourn return ر ج ع r-ʒ-æ

𓂻 ر د د r-d-d redo,return,repeat,reply

كەلمەك kelmek kelmoq > קומען kumen > come < culminate > Tocharian kum- käm- ჩამოსვლა čamosvla

𓃀 pro… przychodzić (pl) impf, przyjść (pl) pf; (by vehicle) przyjeżdżać (pl) impf, przyjechać (pl) pf

𒌝 um ≈ come in

𒁾 tehi 𒌝 tehi₂ 𒋼𒄷 ṭe-ḫu #ţehûⁿ 𓏏 𓎡 𓈖 𓂻 tĕkaⁿ 𒋼 teĝ₃ 𒋾 teĝ₄ доаѓа doaǵa near (verb and adjective)

𓏏 𓎡 𓈖 𓂻 | be near, approach, draw near, attack (someone), border (on) |
𓏏 𓎡 𓈖 𓂻 | come near| tĕka teka @ Austronesian ⇔ take-on towards
𓏏 𓎡 𓈖 𓂻 | come near| datang @ Malay (𓎡 old T)
𓏏 𓎡 𓈖 𓂻 | come near| доаѓа doaǵa @ Macedonian! vs dodge (escape)
𓏏 𓎡 𓈖 𓂻 | come near| дојде dojde @ Macedonian! (𓎡 old T) Slavic *doxoďati дохо́ждам dohóždam доа́гям doágjam
𓏏 𓎡 𓈖 𓂻 | come near| أَتَى جا ʾatā gā (combined roots)
𓏏 𓎡 𓈖 𓂻 | come near| ἱκάνω ᵗhikánō ἥκω ᵗhḗkō ἱκνέομαι ᵗhiknéomai ἵκω ᵗhíkō !!
𓏏 𓎡 𓈖 𓂻 | come near| at-kommen ⇔ आना ānā-come ankommen 𓏏 𓎡 𓈖 𓂻 | come near| ad-kommen ⇔ 𐀁-𐀒-𐀕-𐀜 ˢe-ko-me-no zu-kommen

𒆪𒉡 ku-nu kunu √con #sanāqu •sneak "approach" <> come
